founders.name: Thomas Standen
founders.background_summary: Tom Standen is the Founder of Sylvi, a UK-based tech company focused on language learning through AI-driven, real-world conversation practice. He previously held strategic and analytical roles at McKinsey & Company (Junior Associate) and IBM (Strategic Analytics Consultant). Tom holds an MSc in Physics from The University of Manchester, including an exchange at UCLA. He is known for his hands-on leadership, community engagement, and transparent communication about Sylvi's progress, including successful fundraising and product development milestones.

previous_companies.description: Founded and leads Sylvi, an AI-powered language learning platform focused on real-world conversation and community-driven product development. Raised £350k in super angel funding and grew the user base to 4,000+ learners.
Worked in strategic consulting, supporting clients with analytical and business strategy projects.
Consulted on analytics-driven projects, supporting decision-making and product development.
Produced key models to assist in decision making on product development for a Play 2 Earn Metaverse company.

education.notable_achievements: Completed an exchange program at UCLA.
Exchange program as part of MSc Physics.

investment_criteria_assessment.assessment_summary: Tom Standen is a first-time founder with a strong background in strategy and analytics from McKinsey & Company and IBM. He demonstrates hands-on leadership, community engagement, and the ability to secure funding and grow a tech-driven product. While Sylvi is his first founding role, his impressive education and career trajectory, as well as his transparent and strategic communication, indicate high founder potential. The company's tech and community focus align with key investment criteria, though explicit mission alignment to 'healthier, happier humanity' is not clearly stated.
